block 10 crossed double_crochet stitch today s block uses crossed double_crochet which makes little x shapes across your row it looks fancy but it s really just double_crochet with one tiny twist you ll make a row of regular double_crochet then a row where you skip 1 stitch double_crochet in the next then double_crochet back into the skipped stitch that s your x then a plain double_crochet row again and you keep switching between those two row starting chain 18 row order row 1 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and in each chain across row 2 chain 2 double_crochet in first st crossed double_crochet across double_crochet in last st row 3 chain 2 double_crochet in each st across repeat row 2 and 3 until your block is a square when you re done fasten_off and weave in your tails so this block is ready to join into your bag later pattern block 10 crossed double_crochet stitch starting chain 18 terms us crochet terms abbreviations pg 18 www hodgepodge-crochet com chain chain
